title: News: Wilco stream The Whole Love in its entirety tomorrow
body:
I feel spoiled.

In [my last post about **Wilco**](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/9934-new-video-wilco-art-of-almost-studio-clip/ "My last post about Wilco"), I was bubbling over with excitement at the notion of forthcoming album **_The Whole Love_** being released on September 26th, and getting all broody over a [one and a half minute video](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LdTn0hXzVZU&feature=player_embedded "Ooh it gives me reet chills so it does"). Clearly, the band are aware of their fans’ enthusiasm, since they’ve announced via their newsletter that as ‘a reward for your labors, ours, and those of our forefathers/mothers’, they’re going to be streaming **_The Whole Love_** on [wilcoworld.net](http://wilcoworld.net/#!/home/ "Wilco's website. Recognise.") for a 24 hour period as of 12 noon tomorrow, Central Time. So that’s what…6pm our time? It’ll definitely be worth…_being there_.

Sorry.[
